description: Boardbazar Police Outpost: 24/7 Guarded.
Shilmoon Specialized Hospital: 24/7 Open to Public, Medical Assistance Available.
Dhaka University Proctor Office: Campus Security Available.
Banani Super Market: 24/7 Security, CCTV Monitored.
Square Hospital Panthapath: Medical Assistance, Well-Lit.
Gulshan 1 Police Box: 24/7 Guarded, CCTV Surveillance.
Boardbazar Intersection: High Conflict Risk, especially after dark.
Gazipur: Narrow alleyway: Poor visibility, assault risk.
Farmgate Bus Stand: Crowded/Harassment risk, especially during peak hours.
Motijheel Commercial Area: High risk of assault, especially at night.
Dhanmondi Lake (Walkway side): Pickpocketing reported frequently.
Mohammadpur Shia Mosque area: High risk of mugging.
Sadarghat Terminal: Crowd chaos, especially during ferry boarding times.
Uttara: Sector 11 Park side: Dark at night, occasional reports of assault.
Gabtali: Harassment reported near bus stops.
Dhaka-Ashulia Highway: Frequent mugging reported near this section.
Armed Police Battalion HQ: Highly secure facility with 24/7 armed personnel presence.
Under Kuril Flyover: Isolated area with blind spots and poor lighting. High risk of assault.
Bashundhara Residential Area: Private guarded neighborhood with multiple security checkpoints and patrol.
Desolate street during early morning hours. High risk of mugging due to low foot traffic.
Crowded market area. High incidence of pickpocketing and mobile theft reported.
Narrow, winding roads with poor visibility. Attempted assault reported due to isolation.
Harassment by local groups reported. Area lacks regular police patrolling.
Satmasjid Road: Major thoroughfare lined with restaurants and shops. High pedestrian traffic and well-lit environment make it safe for seeking help.
Asad Gate Traffic Police Box: Major intersection with constant police presence and traffic monitoring.
Katabon Market Area: Reports of verbal street harassment near the pet and book shops.
Near Azimpur Graveyard: Area becomes desolate at night. Reports of snatching and theft due to low visibility.
Jagannath University Campus: Active student area with security personnel. Help readily available from crowd and authorities.
Niloy Residential Area: Guarded apartment complex. Community help and security available.
Kanchon Bridge: Reports of mugging at gunpoint. Extremely high risk area.
